description: Documentation for 9.7.14.5. Matrix multiply-accumulate operation using mma instruction

files.title: Overview
files.summary: This section describes warp-level `mma`, `ldmatrix`, `stmatrix`, and `movmatrix` instructions and the organization of various matrices involved in these instructions.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.1. Matrix Fragments for mma.m8n8k4 with .f16 floating point type
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m8n8k4` with `.f16` floating point type will compute 4 MMA operations of shape `.m8n8k4`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.2. Matrix Fragments for mma.m8n8k4 with .f64 floating point type
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m8n8k4` with `.f64` floating point type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m8n8k4`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.3. Matrix Fragments for mma.m8n8k16
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m8n8k16` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m8n8k16`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.4. Matrix Fragments for mma.m8n8k32
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m8n8k32` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m8n8k32`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.5. Matrix Fragments for mma.m8n8k128
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m8n8k128` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m8n8k128`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.6. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k4
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k4` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k4`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.7. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k8
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k8` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k8`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.8. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k16 with floating point type
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k16` floating point types will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k16`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.9. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k16 with integer type
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k16` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k16`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.10. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k32
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k32` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k32`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.11. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k64
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k64` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k64`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.12. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k128
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k128` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k128`.

files.title: 9.7.14.5.13. Matrix Fragments for mma.m16n8k256
files.summary: A warp executing `mma.m16n8k256` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k256`.
